programme.desc:

programme.title: The Best of 6PR Breakfast
programme.desc: Join Millsy and Karl as they look back on the highlights of the week from 6PR Breakfast.

programme.title: 6PR Breakfast with Millsy & Karl
programme.desc:
If it’s happening in Perth, you’ll hear about it first on 6PR Breakfast with Millsy & Karl.
Established and popular voices on 6PR, Steve Mills and Karl Langdon bring listeners the latest news, interviews and stories that matter most to Perth, combined with new segments that play to their great sense of fun and entertainment.
The iconic John Hughes Hyundai Rumour File after 7am gives listeners the chance to anonymously spill the beans, break the news and win weekly prizes with the chance to win a car, while daily cash is up for grabs in the $1000 Minute.
Give the boys a call weekdays from 5.00am or email them at breakfast@6pr.com.au.

programme.title: Perth Today with Simon Beaumont
programme.desc: Join Simon Beaumont weekdays from 9am to 1pm for Perth Today.

programme.title: Perth Live with Oliver Peterson
programme.desc:
Oliver Peterson sets the agenda for your drive home, cutting through how the stories of the day affect you.
With a focus on news, views and analysis - Oly wants you to be at the centre of the conversation, so make sure you tell him.
Oly’s listeners are engaged and informed because he is well respected by leading news makers, business leaders and political insiders.
As well as setting the news agenda, Perth LIVE has a mix of current affairs, sport, money, finance and international business.
Before linking up with 6PR full time in 2017, Oly was a senior reporter with Nine News Perth.
He covered some of the biggest stories of this decade including the execution of the Bali Nine ringleaders, MH17 and Air Asia plane crashes plus terrorist attacks in Jakarta and Bangkok.
Oly was recognised with a Ruby Hutchison Media Award for exposing an ultra sound scammer on A Current Affair, where a woman gave hundreds of fake photographs to expecting mothers.
It’s not just news and current affairs that interests Oly – he is a self-confessed cricket tragic and is happily married with wife Amy and son Edward.
Let’s talk from 3!

programme.title: The Best of 6PR Breakfast
programme.desc: Join Millsy and Karl as they look back on the highlights of the week from 6PR Breakfast.

programme.title: 6PR Breakfast with Millsy & Karl
programme.desc:
If it’s happening in Perth, you’ll hear about it first on 6PR Breakfast with Millsy & Karl.
Established and popular voices on 6PR, Steve Mills and Karl Langdon bring listeners the latest news, interviews and stories that matter most to Perth, combined with new segments that play to their great sense of fun and entertainment.
The iconic John Hughes Hyundai Rumour File after 7am gives listeners the chance to anonymously spill the beans, break the news and win weekly prizes with the chance to win a car, while daily cash is up for grabs in the $1000 Minute.
Give the boys a call weekdays from 5.00am or email them at breakfast@6pr.com.au.

programme.title: Perth Today with Simon Beaumont
programme.desc: Join Simon Beaumont weekdays from 9am to 1pm for Perth Today.

programme.title: Perth Live with Oliver Peterson
programme.desc:
Oliver Peterson sets the agenda for your drive home, cutting through how the stories of the day affect you.
With a focus on news, views and analysis - Oly wants you to be at the centre of the conversation, so make sure you tell him.
Oly’s listeners are engaged and informed because he is well respected by leading news makers, business leaders and political insiders.
As well as setting the news agenda, Perth LIVE has a mix of current affairs, sport, money, finance and international business.
Before linking up with 6PR full time in 2017, Oly was a senior reporter with Nine News Perth.
He covered some of the biggest stories of this decade including the execution of the Bali Nine ringleaders, MH17 and Air Asia plane crashes plus terrorist attacks in Jakarta and Bangkok.
Oly was recognised with a Ruby Hutchison Media Award for exposing an ultra sound scammer on A Current Affair, where a woman gave hundreds of fake photographs to expecting mothers.
It’s not just news and current affairs that interests Oly – he is a self-confessed cricket tragic and is happily married with wife Amy and son Edward.
Let’s talk from 3!

programme.title: Wide World of Sports
programme.desc:
Wide World of Sports is a brand sports lovers know and love and now it has its very own radio show.
Each day, Mark Readings will be joined by some of the biggest names to have taken to the sporting field and we’ll be checking in with all your favourite teams.
It’s the show sports fans can’t miss, with the opinions you want to hear and all the breaking news as it comes to hand.

programme.title: The Best of 6PR Breakfast

programme.title: 6PR Football
programme.desc: 6PR is your home of the Eagles and Dockers in 2025 and the best destination for WA Footy fans. Listeners will have better access than ever before, able to stream 6PR’s football coverage straight from the 6PR app. Karl Langdon, Adam Papalia, Will Schofield, Brad Hardie, Luke McPharlin, Glen Jakovich, Lee Spurr, Mark Readings and David Mundy are all back on board, with Mark Foreman joining the team. Freo AFLW skipper and 2022 Fairest and Best and All-Australian, Hayley Miller, will also feature across the season bringing her expertise as a player and physio to the call from the boundary. […]
